participant_1.background:
My favorite thing to do is read, but I would be unable to do it if I were blind.
I treasure my ability to swim.
i eat well.
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can bowl in peace and quiet.
I love my spouse for being understanding about my phobia.

participant_2.background:
My first purchase was a Game of Thrones book, which I hid in my room so my parents wouldn't find it.
I'm taking advantage of my newfound freedom to travel and see the world.
My appreciation of nature is a key part of my personality.
I live a very active life, but I always make time for my family.
My black lab is my best friend.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
Great! I'm taking advantage of my newfound freedom to travel and see the world.
That's awesome! What are some of your favorite places you've visited so far?
I really enjoyed my trip to Japan. The culture was so different from what I was used to and I loved exploring all the different temples and shrines.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to visit Japan.
You should definitely go! It's such a beautiful country with so much to offer.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, swim, and bowl.
Me too! I love to read books by George R.R. Martin, and I used to swim competitively when I was younger.
I love Game of Thrones! I'm so excited for the new season to come out.
Me too! I'm not sure how I'm going to wait until then.
I know, right? It's going to be so worth it though.
What's your favorite book by George R.R. Martin?
